short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View all VWO campaigns running on a page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When an application is integrated with VWO A/B testing tool and campaigns are configured to be running on its pages, this extension will be of help to identify all the campaigns running on each page.
